content:
hello friends. as we approach 2022, inside my org, we're doing budgeting, and among them is our OSS contribution budget which hopefully is expanding. unfortunately there is no financial reports from rust-analyzer this year, and furthermore, the OC budget looks to be underutilized, which gives me a hard time to figure out whether or not the project is in need of more funding!

so, i'll ask outright, would additional funding help, and how much funding is necessary to keep r-a sustainable into 2022?

More funding would certainly still help, I think the OpenCollective lists some goals we have yet to reach. There should also be a financial update from earlier this year.
I can give a more detailed response after the holidays.
